Gesper: Combat abilities are only a part of what we wish to learn 
about you. I also think we can learn from each other. Do you agree on 
the embassy, though?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Pacifix nodded. "Very well, but I am not interested in learning how 
to
> fight, I am intersted to learn how any other race lives however. If 
our
> fighting style is what you desire, then so be it."
> 
> OOC: Okay everyone, the Autobots and Decepticons are in shambles 
with so
> many people having disapeared. I want to know if anyone is 
interested in
> taking Slag, Snarl or Swoop? Airly, I am assuming you still have 
Sludge.
